channel.title: Please nerf king execute
channel.description:
I think the king is too swingy, one way to deal with it is to nerf the execute
**1) King shoudnt be able to bypass MM death immunity.** MM way too important
**2) When the king exe a hunter, and the hunter bear, the king should die.** No risk= no fun, good players can bypass it by telling a hunter to wolf someone.
**3) When the possessor jump and the king exe him in the same turn, he won't kill the posessor** If bd fail to exe the possessor on trial, no reason he shoudn't be able to jump.
**4) When the king and the possessor are the last people standing, the possessor will win the game** It's doesnt make sense that the possessor needs an alch or sellsword to win the game, he should be able to win alone, and right now, he can't kill the king, especially if there were more then 1 king in the game

item.title: Please nerf king execute
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
OE is fine. It encourages people to claim to the king. It needs a buff if anything.

Eran_Shmuel:

1) King shoudnt be able to bypass MM death immunity.
MM way too important

That would make it useless.

Eran_Shmuel:

2) When the king exe a hunter, and the hunter bear, the king should die.
No risk= no fun, good players can bypass it by telling a hunter to wolf someone.

No. OE doesn’t count as a visit, and bear only affects visitors.

Eran_Shmuel:

3) When the possessor jump and the king exe him in the same turn, he won’t kill the posessor
If bd fail to exe the possessor on trial, no reason he shoudn’t be able to jump.

This is the only thing I agree with. This interaction doesn’t make sense.

Eran_Shmuel:

4) When the king and the possessor are the last people standing, the possessor will win the game
It’s doesnt make sense that the possessor needs an alch or sellsword to win the game, he should be able to win alone, and right now, he can’t kill the king, especially if there were more then 1 king in the game

Only at night. During the day the king can still finger.

Alice:

The King should never even had OE in the first place. The entire point of the King is supposed to be a socially-oriented one and also a leader in the court, not to be a killing role.

There’s nothing wrong with the king having a single killing ability. Several classes have abilities that aren’t related to their type. OE encourages people to claim to the king. I do agree that the king needs another rework though.
